pages.text:
Shows & Events
Magic of Lights
This holiday season will be even brighter; merrier and more more colorful as Magic of Lights transforms Alabama Adventure and Splash Adventure into a vibrant drive-through holiday-themed light display. The event kicks off November 22nd and ends January 4th. The illuminated displays include a 32-foot-tall animated waving Barbie, Prehistoric Christmas which features life sized dinosaurs, and the legendary Bigfoot Monster Truck and FREE photos with Santa! All of this created with over 2 million sparkling lights to create a festive event that everyone will enjoy!
Dive-In Movie
This new, ALL AGES event is perfect for the whole family! Watch “Finding Nemo” in our 600,000 gallon Wave Pool or enjoy all of our other awesome slides in the water park!
Dive-In Movie night is July 17th! Movie starts at 8:00pm and gates open at 7:00pm. This is a separate admission event, so purchase your tickets early online before we sell out! Already have a 2025 Season Pass? Tickets are heavily discounted for Season Pass holders. Season Pass holders can purchase tickets at the front gate for $15.
Adult Swim Night
You asked! We delivered! Get ready to let loose and have the ultimate night out! This
21 and up
event at
Alabama Adventure on August 15th
is going to be one you don’t want to miss!
Featuring a DJ
spinning the hottest beats all night long.
Dance in the Foam Pit!
Feel the rhythm, jump in the foam, and vibe with the crowd in the most epic foam pit experience!
Discounts available for season pass holders. Already have a 2025 Season Pass? Tickets can be purchased at the gate on the day of the event for $15.
Dive Show
Prepare to be amazed by our high-flying, action-packed dive show! Witness world-class divers perform gravity-defying stunts, thrilling acrobatics, and breathtaking dives from towering heights. Our talented performers showcase skill, strength, and humor as they twist, flip, and plunge into the water below.
Perfect for all ages, this must-see show combines thrills, comedy, and edge-of-your-seat excitement in a fast-paced, family-friendly show.
Shows have ended for the 2025 Season.
